juding_criteria:
Here is a list of every concrete visual element that the final image must contain:

*   Tomahawk steak and potato wedges in a cast iron skillet
*   Wooden cutting board with a large knife
*   Rosemary sprigs
*   Two small bowls of dipping sauces
*   Glass of dark beverage
*   Wooden bowl of coarse salt
*   Small bowl of whole spices
*   Bowl of red leaf salad with apple slices and walnuts
*   Sliced T-bone steak on a black plate
*   Light-colored cloth napkin
*   Fork and knife
*   Small bowl of ground spices
*   Lime wedges
*   Cilantro sprigs
*   Small bowl of pickled red onions
*   Wooden table surface
*   Wooden serving board with cheese (in the top right area)
